Name: TC_SEND_001
Precondition:
User has a valid and active fintech account
User logged in
Sender account has sufficient balance
Receiver email exists
Objective: Verify sending money with sufficient balance
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system displays the send money page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid receiver email address
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system accepts the entered email address without validation errors
The system proceeds to the amount selection page

The system accepts the entered amount without displaying any validation 
errors

The system displays the transaction coniformation page with correct 
transaction details
The system displays the transaction receipt page

Name: TC_SEND_002
Precondition:
User has a valid and active fintech account
User logged in
Receiver email exists
Objective: Verify sending money with insufficient balance
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system displays the send money page
The system accepts the entered email address without validation errors
The system proceeds to the amount selection page
The amount enter field accepts the entered value

The system displays an error message indicating that the balance is 
insufficient

Name: TC_SEND_003
Precondition:
User has a valid and active fintech account
User logged in
Receiver email exists
Objective: Verify error message displayed when transfer amount is zero
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system displays the send money page
The system accepts the entered email address without validation errors
The system proceeds to the amount selection page

The system allows entering the amount but does not display any error at 
this stage

The system disables the next button and displays and error message 
indicating that the amount must be greater than zero

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system displays the send money page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid receiver email address

The system proceeds to the amount selection page

Name: TC_SEND_005
Precondition:
User has a valid and active fintech account
User logged in
Sender account has sufficient balance
Receiver email exists
Objective:
Verify duplicate click on send button does not create duplicate 
transactions
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system displays the send money page

Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Step: Enter a valid receiver email address
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: The system accepts the entered email address without validation errors
The system proceeds to the amount selection page

The system accepts the entered amount without displaying any validation 
errors

The system displays the transaction coniformation page with correct 
transaction details

The system process only one transaction, displays a single transaction 
receipt page, and prevents duplicate transaction creation
